parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the IP address blacklist.

parameters.name: ExpiredTime
parameters.description:
The timestamp after which the IP address blacklist becomes invalid. Unit: seconds.

>  If you set the parameter to **0**, the IP address blacklist is always valid.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: IpList
parameters.description: The IP addresses that you want to add to the IP address blacklist. CIDR blocks and IP addresses are supported. IPv4 and IPv6 addresses are supported. Separate the CIDR blocks or IP addresses with commas (,). For more information, see [Protection for major events](~~425591~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the IP address blacklist rule for major event protection.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the IP address blacklist rule template for major event protection.
